description: Discussions on the Budget 2023 front have focused on social issues, obscuring the lack of an economic strategy. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Budget 2023: All quiet on the economic front
title_page: Budget 2023: All quiet on the economic front | The Straits Times
maintext:
Budget 2023 reveals one stark truth.
Social issues are now not only getting more attention than economic ones, the Government appears to have readier solutions to them than those concerning the economy.
